8.27.18  1:22 am   i feel like i'm AWFUL at music related crap ghjghgjhd i really love music but like. i know literally nothing about how to make things Good and i only have garageband for my fricking iphone which is really tedious to use and i just end up getting frustrated and give up. sure people can actually make good stuff with garageband on their phones but i feel like i'm not one of those people + i'm not patient with myself so i just end up smashing the keys on the piano and make nothing. at least nothing good, or nothing i end up keeping. i make a beat and then i listen to it and i realize that it's Garbage!!!!!!!!!!

      i want to make cool songs, i really do, but i don't know if that's really what i should be spending my time doing; which on another note, i don't know if i should actually spend money to learn how to play the piano

      or if i should figure out a way to teach myself because i'm having a very hard time understanding the piano and sheet music and what keys are what and what chords are what and what things fricking mean and i'm FBDSHBDFSBSD i just want to make cool music but it's all so complicated and hard for me.

      i don't know if i should stop trying or not. should i give up? should i just go back to making drawings that may or may not be any good? that seems to be the only thing i actually know anything about ... i enjoy it for the most part but i've recently wanted to do Other Things, like music, but i don't know if it's worth trying or if i even have the potential in the first place to do it? i know nothing! is it too late for me? i'm still "a kid" but i'm not the ideal age of where people start doing music related stuff? like idk most people who are good at piano and stuff started when they were like 5 or something and i am Not 5 so ehwbtfgdsjgsjdjgfsdjhgsj this is word vomit i'm sorry i just don't know what to do or if i should even do anything

8.26.18  7:47 pm   Today I found myself watching YouTube videos all day, afraid to do anything besides that. I do have feelings of discomfort like that- which makes it hard for me to do activities that seem a bit scary to me even though it's all in my head. But today was the first time I had actually stooped so low in a very very long time. I was procrastinating on these two simple tasks I told myself to fulfill. Prior to playing my keyboard, I wanted to inspect my approach to music and perhaps change it. And I wanted to draw something original because I find that so scary. Both tasks were scary to me- playing the keyboard and drawing something original. The reason why playing the keyboard to me is scary is because my mind numbs to it and I find it harder to innovate. This makes me feel bad because it makes me feel like an insecure failiure. Drawing something original scares me because I'm the past I've found it to be quite a stress enduring task because I judge my wor k so har shly, I find it difficult to lift myself off the ground and persue an idea because I want it to be so perfect so bad. So both tasks are pretty stress enducing and my procrastination and fear got the best of me. It makes me feel sad. But... procrastinating felt so good that I'm confused to this whole situation. I came to the conclusion this morning that my approach to art was causing unnecessary stress and if I change my approach, art is bound to be more fun for me. But I pussied out! Because I was back in my stupid house that I hate being in and I found it to be so overwhelming I didn't even dare to try. Dammit I'm fucking retarded. ...why is it so hard for me to do this? It honestly upsets me. Oh my god I'm so sorry! I'm apologizing to you and me. Fuck- I could've been out there doing something amazing and getting over these fears but fuck no! All I thought about were those crippling feelings I got out of my past attempts. Ohhhh this is the first time in the past couple day s that I 've actually been this upset. Fuck you tat! Fuck fuck fuck fuck you for being so scared and fuck you for being so unable to change you fucking retarded bitch! Why can't I fucking change myself to actually be the person I dream of??? AAUUGHHHHHHHHHH IM MAD IM MAD IM MAD but you want to hear something? My mind doesn't feel overworked or upset at my dumbass!!! I feel like a piece of shit. You know what? I'm done. Fuck it. I'm going to that damn room and I'm going to create something beautiful. I'm done with this fucking bullshit of sabatoging myself. My punishment for not persuing my fears is to make myself uncomfortable facing my fears. I find that thought quite hillarious for some reason. Anyways I'll be back. Im about to fucking whip my ass and I forgot what other bullshit I was going to say I'm so mad right now BYE
